attributes.action: Rethink Road Pricing Proposals which at peak charge of £1.34 pence per mile which will equate to vehicles achieving 40miles per gallon,paying the equivalent of an extra £53.60 per gallon for peak time travel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is wrong and unfair to expect the general public, especially low-paid workers, pensioners etc. to afford these excessive charges In many cases alternative public transport is available. The proposals, if adopted, will deprive people of holiday and liesure travel, and commuting to work will become unaffordable.Quality of life could be seriously eroded, as the proposals do not take ability to pay into consideration

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
